creator: Lydia Solutions
descriptionHtml:
Whether you need to pay back a friend for rent, make a purchase in your local coffee shop, or buy a concert ticket online, Lydia offers a simple interface so you can link your phone with your card and pay anyone with one app.

Cash is over. Cheques are over. Bank transfers are over. With Lydia, the only thing you need to make or receive a payment is already in your hands. From now on, you can use your smartphone to pay friends and businesses by card. Say hello to pain-free payments.

Simple, fast, and 100% secure
- Pay a friend back for dinner, a cinema ticket, rent, etc.
- Request money from a friend in one tap.
- Pay in-store with your phone.
Oh, and it’s completely free.
Lydia uses the most advanced security systems and data encryption to protect your financial and personal information.

The press recommends Lydia
- “Lydia is amongst Europe’s 100 hottest startups of 2015” - Wired
- “To pay with your phone, use Lydia” - Que Choisir
- “Let me tell you, Lydia is AWESOME!!” - BFM TV
- “The app that will change our habits and turn mobile payment into a real alternative” - Le Parisien

Try it out now!
descriptionShort: The best solution to send money to your friends instantly, and pay a business

appDetails.recentChangesHtml:
The payment and money collection experience have been improved and boosted. The app layout also evolved and offers a direct access to our key features: shared accounts, money pots and share the bill.
And given the news, we added a donation section so giving to an NGO becomes as quick and easy as making a Lydia to a friend.

title: Lydia - Mobile Payment

creator: Lydia Solutions
descriptionHtml:
"After having revolutionised payments between loved ones for millions of French people, Lydia is now reinventing their bank account.

In a few seconds you can:
- Pay any contact free of charge and securely.
- Request a reimbursement from a loved one or share a bill.
- Collect money for all your events with money pools.

Lydia is now revolutionising your current account:
- Spend your money from Lydia via our physical cards or Internet Visa.
- Forget about unpleasant surprises abroad, your payments and withdrawals are free of charge.
- Enjoy contactless, with no limit on the amount, for all your purchases via Apple Pay and Google Pay.
- Track your balance, and receive instant notifications for each of your payments and bank transfers.
- Create sub-accounts to better organise your money, or shared accounts to facilitate your spending as a couple, as a roommate or as a family.

But also…
- Secure your payments on the internet with Internet Cards
- Connect all your bank accounts to Lydia, so you will only need one app.

The media recommend Lydia:
<< Lydia is one of the 100 most promising startups in Europe. >> - Wired
<< The application that will change our habits and make payments with a smartphone a real alternative >> - Le Parisien
<< For payment by phone, use Lydia. >> - Que Choisir
<< I’m telling you, Lydia is the BOMB !>> - BFM TV


100% secure, the Lydia app is developed in Paris by a passionate and independent team, respecting the latest banking and IT security standards. Lydia respects your privacy and the European GDPR directives."
descriptionShort: The best solution to send money to your friends instantly, and pay a business

appDetails.recentChangesHtml: A new button has made an appearance in-app: it will now be easier to cancel a payment sent to the wrong person in the event of a wrong phone number.

- Forget about unpleasant surprises abroad, your payments and withdrawals are free of charge.
- Enjoy contactless, with no limit on the amount, for all your purchases via Apple Pay and Google Pay.
- Track your balance, and receive instant notifications for each of your payments and bank transfers.
- Create sub-accounts to better organise your money, or shared accounts to facilitate your spending as a couple, as a roommate or as a family.

But also…
- Secure your internet payments with Internet Cards
- Connect all your bank accounts to Lydia, in order to only use one app.


100% secure, the Lydia app is developed in Paris by a passionate and independent team, complying with the latest banking and IT security standards. Lydia respects your privacy and the European GDPR directives.
descriptionShort: The best solution to send money to your friends instantly, and pay a business

descriptionShort: Receive, spend and manage all your money more simply, all in a single app.

appDetails.recentChangesHtml:
Here is a brand new Lydia, a new app that aims to be the perfect combination between the old Lydia - the mobile payment app - and the new Lydia, the super-app that re-invent the checking account and the daily money.
We had dreamed of this version for a long time, but we first had to consolidate all of our existing features. It’s now done : a new page is being written for Lydia. It’s up to you to personalize it as you wish.
Welcome to Lydia 10, the app that will make you forget your bank’s one.

- Forget about unpleasant surprises abroad, your payments and withdrawals are free of charge.
- Enjoy contactless, with no limit on the amount, for all your purchases via Google Pay.
- Track your balance, and receive instant notifications for each of your payments and bank transfers.
- Create sub-accounts to better organise your money, or shared accounts to facilitate your spending as a couple, as a roommate or as a family.

But also…
- Secure your internet payments with Internet Cards
- Connect all your bank accounts to Lydia, in order to only use one app.


100% secure, the Lydia app is developed in Paris by a passionate and independent team, complying with the latest banking and IT security standards. Lydia respects your privacy and the European GDPR directives.
descriptionShort: Receive, spend and manage all your money more simply, all in a single app.

appDetails.recentChangesHtml:

They are created and displayed 10 times faster than before, when you need them, to pay securely online.

appDetails.recentChangesHtml: Summer is coming and you need to go on vacation. Since Lydia is not only useful for refunds but also for receiving money, you can for instance split a big transaction with our small loans solution to book a hotel. Moreover, you can always ask money from friends or even split the bill for a transaction you have already made. Don't forget to create a shared account for your next trip with your friends to better organize every spending.

appDetails.recentChangesHtml: Following the recent new features, many users are using Lydia as a current account! In this version, we have designed a new screen that will allow those who use Lydia more and more, to better support them in their choice of Lydia subscription. Lydia Bleu, for the unlimited number of transactions? Lydia Noir for a large number of Internet card creation? Go to your profile, in the "My limits" screen.

appDetails.recentChangesHtml: The savings account according to Lydia. 15 billion euros. That's the amount collected on Livret A savings accounts in the first quarter of 2021 and it's a record for the last 8 years. Yet, it was not yet possible to open an interest-bearing savings account on Lydia... until now. Update your app to open your savings account in minutes. The classic remuneration, already interesting (0.6%), is even boosted to 2% the first two months. Access is reserved for verified profiles.

appDetails.recentChangesHtml:
New: "Buy now and pay later"

Discover 3x payment everywhere and for everything thanks to the Lydia card. Now any day-to-day expense (online or in-store) can be spread over time. Convenient when you are waiting for an inflow of money or to optimize your expenses. Assess your eligibility in seconds and find out the maximum amount for which you can use this service.

Go to the Profile (3rd tab) or the Market (5th tab).

They are created and displayed 10 times faster than before, when you need them, to pay securely online.

title: Lydia - The super-app, for your money

creator: Lydia Solutions
descriptionHtml:
After having revolutionised payments between millions of people, Lydia is now reinventing their bank account.

In a few seconds you can:
- Pay any contact with a phone number free of charge and securely.
- Request a reimbursement from a friend or share a bill.
- Collect money for all your events with money pools.

Lydia is now revolutionising your current account:
- Spend your money from Lydia via our physical cards or Internet Visa.
- Forget about unpleasant surprises abroad, your payments and withdrawals are free of charge.
- Enjoy contactless, with no limit on the amount, for all your purchases via Google Pay.
- Track your balance, and receive instant notifications for each of your payments and bank transfers.
- Create sub-accounts to better organise your money, or shared accounts to facilitate your spending as a couple, as a roommate or as a family.

But also…
- Secure your internet payments with Internet Cards
- Connect all your bank accounts to Lydia, in order to only use one app.

And now, you can access small express loans, from 3 to 36 months for a maximum annual percentage rate of 21.03% (example: € 600 over 3 months for a total cost of € 614.10 including € 14.10 of administration fees or € 2000 over 24 months for a total cost of € 2395.68 including € 359.68 of interest and € 36 of administration fees), on top of which there is a maximum fee of € 24.90 only for the option of instant fund availability.

100% secure, the Lydia app is developed in Paris by a passionate and independent team, complying with the latest banking and IT security standards. Lydia respects your privacy and the European GDPR directives.
descriptionShort: Receive, spend and manage all your money more simply, all in a single app.

appDetails.recentChangesHtml:
Safer online payments
Need to make a purchase on the internet? Whether it is one-time thing or recurrent, Lydia allows you to have free card numbers that can be changed as you wish. No need to use your personal card, therefore less risk of fraud. Available from the Card tab (second tab of the app), create an internet card for your next purchases. They can even self-destruct!

descriptionShort: Receive, spend and manage all your money more simply, all in a single app.

appDetails.recentChangesHtml:
**One IBAN for every of your accounts**

With Lydia, you can have an account for every situation: a shared account for daily expenses as a couple or even a piggy bank for a specific objective. Now you can create an IBAN for every of these accounts. Useful to reload them with your salary, with a wire, and even to pay electricity bills.
To create an IBAN specific to your account, open the concerned account and click on IBAN, it's instant!

And now, you can access small express loans, from 3 to 36 months for a maximum annual percentage rate of 21.03% (example: € 600 over 3 months for a total cost of € 614.10 including € 14.10 of administration fees or € 2000 over 24 months for a total cost of € 2395.68 including € 359.68 of interest and € 36 of administration fees), on top of which there is a maximum fee of € 24.90 only for the option of instant fund availability.

100% secure, the Lydia app is developed in Paris by a passionate and independent team, complying with the latest banking and IT security standards. Lydia respects your privacy and the European GDPR directives.
descriptionShort: Receive, spend and manage all your money more simply, all in a single app.

appDetails.recentChangesHtml:
**One IBAN for every of your accounts**

With Lydia, you can have an account for every situation: a shared account for daily expenses as a couple or even a piggy bank for a specific objective. Now you can create an IBAN for every of these accounts. Useful to reload them with your salary, with a wire, and even to pay electricity bills.
To create an IBAN specific to your account, open the concerned account and click on IBAN, it's instant!

title: Lydia - The super-app, for your money

creator: Lydia Solutions
descriptionHtml:
After having revolutionised payments between millions of people, Lydia is now reinventing their bank account.

In a few seconds you can:
- Pay any contact with a phone number free of charge and securely.
- Request a reimbursement from a friend or share a bill.
- Collect money for all your events with money pools.

Lydia is now revolutionising your current account:
- Spend your money from Lydia via our physical cards or Internet Visa.
- Forget about unpleasant surprises abroad, your payments and withdrawals are free of charge.
- Enjoy contactless, with no limit on the amount, for all your purchases via Google Pay.
- Track your balance, and receive instant notifications for each of your payments and bank transfers.
- Create sub-accounts to better organise your money, or shared accounts to facilitate your spending as a couple, as a roommate or as a family.

But also…
- Secure your internet payments with Internet Cards
- Connect all your bank accounts to Lydia, in order to only use one app.

And now, you can access small express loans, from 3 to 36 months for a maximum annual percentage rate of 21.03% (example: € 600 over 3 months for a total cost of € 614.10 including € 14.10 of administration fees or € 2000 over 24 months for a total cost of € 2395.68 including € 359.68 of interest and € 36 of administration fees), on top of which there is a maximum fee of € 24.90 only for the option of instant fund availability.

100% secure, the Lydia app is developed in Paris by a passionate and independent team, complying with the latest banking and IT security standards. Lydia respects your privacy and the European GDPR directives.

appDetails.recentChangesHtml:
The trading with Lydia

Ready to invest from your mobile? You don't need to download a new app to do that. We've done it!  There's something for everyone: companies*, crypto-currencies and even precious metals are available from the homepage. Innovation: you can try starting 1€. It works just like you make a Lydia ®! What will be your first investment? Don't forget: any investment carries a risk of total or partial capital loss

*Stocks derivatives are financial contracts that replicate a stock.

appDetails.recentChangesHtml:
**Goal-oriented accounts**

To start the year 2022 on the right foot, Lydia helps you keep your resolutions. From the homepage, create a piggy bank and define the goal amount to reach. No more excuses for not reaching them! You can also create a goal for your shared accounts and money pots. Plus, take advantage of our new photo gallery, created by our designer Felix, to make your accounts look better!

appDetails.recentChangesHtml:
**Comments on shared transactions**

Because everything is shared in a shared account, comments on a transaction are now visible to all account members. Very practical for duo accounts, your partner will now know if you remembered to buy a loaf of bread for tonight! No need to ask anymore.

In a few seconds you can:
- Pay any contact with a phone number free of charge and securely.
- Request a reimbursement from a friend or share a bill.
- Collect money for all your events with money pools.

Lydia is now revolutionising your current account:
- Spend your money from Lydia via our physical cards or Internet Visa.
- Forget about unpleasant surprises abroad, your payments and withdrawals are free of charge.
- Enjoy contactless, with no limit on the amount, for all your purchases via Google Pay.
- Track your balance, and receive instant notifications for each of your payments and bank transfers.
- Create sub-accounts to better organise your money, or shared accounts to facilitate your spending as a couple, as a roommate or as a family.

But also…
- Secure your internet payments with Internet Cards
- Connect all your bank accounts to Lydia, in order to only use one app.

And now, you can access small express loans, from 3 to 36 months for a maximum annual percentage rate of 21.03% (example: € 600 over 3 months for a total cost of € 614.10 including € 14.10 of administration fees or € 2000 over 24 months for a total cost of € 2395.68 including € 359.68 of interest and € 36 of administration fees), on top of which there is a maximum fee of € 24.90 only for the option of instant fund availability.

100% secure, the Lydia app is developed in Paris by a passionate and independent team, complying with the latest banking and IT security standards. Lydia respects your privacy and the European GDPR directives.
descriptionShort: Receive, spend and manage all your money more simply, all in a single app.

descriptionShort: Receive, spend and manage all your money more simply, all in a single app.

appDetails.recentChangesHtml:
Secure your online payments with our Internet cards

Don't risk entering your credit card numbers anywhere on the Internet and getting hacked. We've redesigned the second tab of the app, the "Cards" tab, to make Internet cards more accessible. Hit "Use" to generate a card that will self-destruct after a payment and make your purchases much safer.

appDetails.recentChangesHtml:
Send more than money with Lydia.
Because sending money, even as simple as sending a Lydia, is always a bit of a pain for the wallet. To celebrate The Batman movie release, Lydia allows you to send something else, from the 19th of February to the 5th of March: batarangs, Bruce Wayne's favorite weapon. Challenge your friends and win prizes! PS: other Gotham City Easter Eggs have been hidden in the application, go and discover them!

And now, you can access small express loans, from 3 to 36 months for a maximum annual percentage rate of 21.03% (example: € 600 over 3 months for a total cost of € 614.10 including € 14.10 of administration fees or € 2000 over 24 months for a total cost of € 2395.68 including € 359.68 of interest and € 36 of administration fees), on top of which there is a maximum fee of € 24.90 only for the option of instant fund availability.

100% secure, the Lydia app is developed in Paris by a passionate and independent team, complying with the latest banking and IT security standards. Lydia respects your privacy and the European GDPR directives.
descriptionShort: Receive, spend and manage all your money more simply, all in a single app.

appDetails.recentChangesHtml:
**The new Lydia**
This is one of our most exciting updates. The one that will change the way you think about money.
Add photos to your transactions: craft lasting memories from what you spend.
Access all your accounts in a clearer and more readable way.
Discover a dedicated tab for investments: invest more confidently.
Experience the pleasure of managing your money.

title: Lydia - Current account

creator: Lydia Solutions
descriptionHtml:
After having revolutionised payments between millions of people, Lydia is now reinventing their bank account.

In a few seconds you can:
- Pay any contact with a phone number free of charge and securely.
- Request a reimbursement from a friend or share a bill.
- Collect money for all your events with money pools.

Lydia is now revolutionising your current account:
- Spend your money from Lydia via our physical cards or Internet Visa.
- Forget about unpleasant surprises abroad, your payments and withdrawals are free of charge.
- Enjoy contactless, with no limit on the amount, for all your purchases via Google Pay.
- Track your balance, and receive instant notifications for each of your payments and bank transfers.
- Create sub-accounts to better organise your money, or shared accounts to facilitate your spending as a couple, as a roommate or as a family.

But also…
- Secure your internet payments with Internet Cards
- Connect all your bank accounts to Lydia, in order to only use one app.

appDetails.recentChangesHtml:
We removed it. You called for it. We reinstated it.

It is the return of the drag and drop functionality.

You never heard of it before? Try it, it's great: drag the icon from one account to another to simply transfer money in a single gesture.

You can also rearrange the order of your accounts by long-pressing the account you want to move, then dragging it.

And now, you can access small express loans, from 3 to 36 months for a maximum annual percentage rate of 21.03% (example: € 600 over 3 months for a total cost of € 614.10 including € 14.10 of administration fees or € 2000 over 24 months for a total cost of € 2395.68 including € 359.68 of interest and € 36 of administration fees), on top of which there is a maximum fee of € 24.90 only for the option of instant fund availability.

100% secure, the Lydia app is developed in Paris by a passionate and independent team, complying with the latest banking and IT security standards. Lydia respects your privacy and the European GDPR directives.
descriptionShort: Receive, spend and manage all your money more simply, all in a single app.

appDetails.recentChangesHtml:
We removed it. You called for it. We reinstated it.

It is the return of the drag and drop functionality.

You never heard of it before? Try it, it's great: drag the icon from one account to another to simply transfer money in a single gesture.

You can also rearrange the order of your accounts by long-pressing the account you want to move, then dragging it.

title: Lydia - Current account

creator: Lydia Solutions
descriptionHtml:
After having revolutionised payments between millions of people, Lydia is now reinventing their bank account.

- Spend your money from Lydia via our physical cards or Internet Visa.

appDetails.recentChangesHtml:
Lydia Green, the current account that does good.

By choosing Lydia Green, you can rest assured that your funds will be used by a cooperative bank. That cooperative bank is La Nef, the standard of ethical finance in France since 1988 that exclusively finances responsible and local projects.
In short, with Lydia Green, you’re making the sustainable choice.

- Forget about unpleasant surprises abroad, your payments and withdrawals are free of charge.
- Enjoy contactless, with no limit on the amount, for all your purchases via Google Pay.
- Track your balance, and receive instant notifications for each of your payments and bank transfers.
- Create sub-accounts to better organise your money, or shared accounts to facilitate your spending as a couple, as a roommate or as a family.

But also…
- Secure your internet payments with Internet Cards
- Connect all your bank accounts to Lydia, in order to only use one app.

And now, you can access small express loans, from 3 to 36 months for a maximum annual percentage rate of 21.03% (example: € 600 over 3 months for a total cost of € 614.10 including € 14.10 of administration fees or € 2000 over 24 months for a total cost of € 2395.68 including € 359.68 of interest and € 36 of administration fees), on top of which there is a maximum fee of € 24.90 only for the option of instant fund availability.

100% secure, the Lydia app is developed in Paris by a passionate and independent team, complying with the latest banking and IT security standards. Lydia respects your privacy and the European GDPR directives.
descriptionShort: Receive, spend and manage all your money more simply, all in a single app.

appDetails.recentChangesHtml:
Lydia Green, the current account that does good.

By choosing Lydia Green, you can rest assured that your funds will be used by a cooperative bank. That cooperative bank is La Nef, the standard of ethical finance in France since 1988 that exclusively finances responsible and local projects.
In short, with Lydia Green, you’re making the sustainable choice.

appDetails.recentChangesHtml:
Keeping your budget under control, it’s possible!
"Grocceries" "Housing", "Sports and leisure": Organize your spendings with the "Enveloppe" accounts. Each month, distribute your money in your enveloppes and spend it with your Lydia card. Budgeting equals savings!

title: Lydia - Current account

creator: Lydia Solutions
descriptionHtml:
After having revolutionised payments between millions of people, Lydia is now reinventing their bank account.

In a few seconds you can:
- Pay any contact with a phone number free of charge and securely.
- Request a reimbursement from a friend or share a bill.
- Collect money for all your events with money pools.

Lydia is now revolutionising your current account:
- Spend your money from Lydia via our physical cards or Internet Visa.
- Forget about unpleasant surprises abroad, your payments and withdrawals are free of charge.
- Enjoy contactless, with no limit on the amount, for all your purchases via Google Pay.
- Track your balance, and receive instant notifications for each of your payments and bank transfers.
- Create sub-accounts to better organise your money, or shared accounts to facilitate your spending as a couple, as a roommate or as a family.

But also…
- Secure your internet payments with Internet Cards
- Connect all your bank accounts to Lydia, in order to only use one app.

descriptionShort: Receive, spend and manage all your money more simply, all in a single app.

appDetails.recentChangesHtml:
Pay, scratch… won?

Every time you make a purchase with your Lydia card, a scratch-off ticket is waiting for you in the payment receipt. Scratch it: if the ticket is a winner, your purchase is refunded up to €100. And every payment is a new chance to win!

Note: the scratch ticket is a benefit of Lydia blue, green and black users.

title: Lydia - Current account

creator: Lydia app
descriptionHtml:
After having revolutionised payments between millions of people, Lydia is now reinventing their bank account.

In a few seconds you can:
- Pay any contact with a phone number free of charge and securely.
- Request a reimbursement from a friend or share a bill.
- Collect money for all your events with money pools.

Lydia is now revolutionising your current account:
- Spend your money from Lydia via our physical cards or Internet Visa.
- Forget about unpleasant surprises abroad, your payments and withdrawals are free of charge.
- Enjoy contactless, with no limit on the amount, for all your purchases via Google Pay.
- Track your balance, and receive instant notifications for each of your payments and bank transfers.
- Create sub-accounts to better organise your money, or shared accounts to facilitate your spending as a couple, as a roommate or as a family.

But also…
- Secure your internet payments with Internet Cards
- Connect all your bank accounts to Lydia, in order to only use one app.

And now, you can access small express loans, from 3 to 36 months for a maximum annual percentage rate of 21.03% (example: € 600 over 3 months for a total cost of € 614.10 including € 14.10 of administration fees or € 2000 over 24 months for a total cost of € 2395.68 including € 359.68 of interest and € 36 of administration fees), on top of which there is a maximum fee of € 24.90 only for the option of instant fund availability.

100% secure, the Lydia app is developed in Paris by a passionate and independent team, complying with the latest banking and IT security standards. Lydia respects your privacy and the European GDPR directives.

title: Lydia - Current account

creator: Lydia app
descriptionHtml:

But also…
- Secure your internet payments with Internet Cards
- Connect all your bank accounts to Lydia, in order to only use one app.
- Take a personal loan easily

The decision to grant or not a credit as well as the conditions for granting it are defined by our credit partners and depend on several criteria, including income and living expenses.
Before granting any credit, the lending institution will inform the borrower of all the terms and conditions of the credit, such as the annual percentage rate of charge (APR) and the repayment terms.
The loans that can be subscribed via the Lydia application have a minimum duration of 90 days and a maximum duration of 36 months. The minimum APR is 13.90% and the maximum APR is 20.79%. In all cases, the APR cannot exceed the usury rate determined by the Banque de France.
Below is an example of a credit that can be granted:
Credit amount : € 300.00
Credit term : 90 days
APR : 20.33%
Management fees : € 8.79
Instant reception fees (optional) : € 0.30
Amount of fees paid right away : € 9.09
Amount repaid per month : € 100.00
Total cost of credit : € 309.09

100% secure, the Lydia app is developed in Paris by a passionate and independent team, complying with the latest banking and IT security standards. Lydia respects your privacy and the European GDPR directives.
descriptionShort: Receive, spend and manage all your money more simply, all in a single app.

appDetails.recentChangesHtml: With the latest update of the application, we have given much more space to customer service: a main tab of the application is now dedicated to it. You can find practical information about the application as well as access to your messages with the Lydia team. In this new version, we have reworked the messaging system so that you can easily follow the arrival of new messages and know the status of your conversations.

descriptionShort: Receive, spend and manage all your money more simply, all in a single app.

appDetails.recentChangesHtml:
Free and instant refunds are changing: from now on, you need to have a sufficient balance on your Lydia account to be able to "make a Lydia". We have simplified the procedure for funding your account by credit card or via the Lydia IBAN.

We've also improved the way you can view and manage your payment limits in the 'Limits' tab of your profile. Finally, it's even easier to get answers to all your questions in the "Help" tab of the application.

appDetails.recentChangesHtml: To ensure your direct debits never come as a surprise, we have added an insert in the first tab: it shows the card debit(s) that will soon be debited from your Lydia account. Your direct debit details are now at your fingertips: tapping on the insert will display the origin, date, amount, etc.

Lydia is now revolutionising your current account:
- Spend your money from Lydia via our physical cards or Internet Visa.
- Forget about unpleasant surprises abroad, your payments and withdrawals are free of charge.
- Enjoy contactless, with no limit on the amount, for all your purchases via Google Pay.
- Track your balance, and receive instant notifications for each of your payments and bank transfers.
- Create sub-accounts to better organise your money, or shared accounts to facilitate your spending as a couple, as a roommate or as a family.

But also…
- Secure your internet payments with Internet Cards
- Connect all your bank accounts to Lydia, in order to only use one app.
- Take a personal loan easily

The decision to grant or not a credit as well as the conditions for granting it are defined by our credit partners and depend on several criteria, including income and living expenses.
Before granting any credit, the lending institution will inform the borrower of all the terms and conditions of the credit, such as the annual percentage rate of charge (APR) and the repayment terms.
The loans that can be subscribed via the Lydia application have a minimum duration of 90 days and a maximum duration of 36 months. The minimum APR is 13.90% and the maximum APR is 20.79%. In all cases, the APR cannot exceed the usury rate determined by the Banque de France.
Below is an example of a credit that can be granted:
Credit amount : € 300.00
Credit term : 90 days
APR : 20.33%
Management fees : € 8.79
Instant reception fees (optional) : € 0.30
Amount of fees paid right away : € 9.09
Amount repaid per month : € 100.00
Total cost of credit : € 309.09

100% secure, the Lydia app is developed in Paris by a passionate and independent team, complying with the latest banking and IT security standards. Lydia respects your privacy and the European GDPR directives.
descriptionShort: Receive, spend and manage all your money more simply, all in a single app.

appDetails.recentChangesHtml: To ensure your direct debits never come as a surprise, we have added an insert in the first tab: it shows the card debit(s) that will soon be debited from your Lydia account. Your direct debit details are now at your fingertips: tapping on the insert will display the origin, date, amount, etc.

appDetails.recentChangesHtml: The new Lydia IBAN is here! Following the granting of a new banking licence, Lydia now offers its users a new IBAN, issued by Lydia, in complete autonomy. In this version of the app, users can view their new IBAN and start using it. All they have to do is click on the 'RIB' insert in the first tab to access it. The detail that makes all the difference: the BIC code of this new IBAN is "LYDI", for Lydia.

appDetails.recentChangesHtml: The Lydia application used to display five tabs: 'Payment', 'Accounts', 'Cards', 'Help' and 'Profile'. For more simplicity, the number of tabs has been reduced to four, and the 'Account' tab now contains everything you need to manage your money and your account: your accounts and pots, your cards (including virtual cards and contactless mobile payment), your IBAN, your personal information, your security settings, etc.

Lydia is now revolutionising your current account:
- Spend your money from Lydia via our physical cards or Internet Visa.
- Forget about unpleasant surprises abroad, your payments and withdrawals are free of charge.
- Enjoy contactless, with no limit on the amount, for all your purchases via Google Pay.
- Track your balance, and receive instant notifications for each of your payments and bank transfers.
- Create sub-accounts to better organise your money, or shared accounts to facilitate your spending as a couple, as a roommate or as a family.

But also…
- Secure your internet payments with Internet Cards
- Connect all your bank accounts to Lydia, in order to only use one app.
- Take a personal loan easily

The decision to grant or not a credit as well as the conditions for granting it are defined by our credit partners and depend on several criteria, including income and living expenses.
Before granting any credit, the lending institution will inform the borrower of all the terms and conditions of the credit, such as the annual percentage rate of charge (APR) and the repayment terms.
The loans that can be subscribed via the Lydia application have a minimum duration of 90 days and a maximum duration of 36 months. The minimum APR is 13.90% and the maximum APR is 20.79%. In all cases, the APR cannot exceed the usury rate determined by the Banque de France.
Below is an example of a credit that can be granted:
Credit amount : € 300.00
Credit term : 90 days
APR : 20.33%
Management fees : € 8.79
Instant reception fees (optional) : € 0.30
Amount of fees paid right away : € 9.09
Amount repaid per month : € 100.00
Total cost of credit : € 309.09

100% secure, the Lydia app is developed in Paris by a passionate and independent team, complying with the latest banking and IT security standards. Lydia respects your privacy and the European GDPR directives.
descriptionShort: Receive, spend and manage all your money more simply, all in a single app.

appDetails.recentChangesHtml: The Lydia application used to display five tabs: 'Payment', 'Accounts', 'Cards', 'Help' and 'Profile'. - Request a reimbursement from a friend or share a bill.
- Collect money for all your events with money pools.

Lydia is now revolutionising your current account:
- Spend your money from Lydia via our physical cards or Internet Visa.
- Forget about unpleasant surprises abroad, your payments and withdrawals are free of charge.
- Enjoy contactless, with no limit on the amount, for all your purchases via Google Pay.
- Track your balance, and receive instant notifications for each of your payments and bank transfers.
- Create sub-accounts to better organise your money, or shared accounts to facilitate your spending as a couple, as a roommate or as a family.

But also…
- Secure your internet payments with Internet Cards
- Connect all your bank accounts to Lydia, in order to only use one app.
- Take a personal loan easily

The decision to grant or not a credit as well as the conditions for granting it are defined by our credit partners and depend on several criteria, including income and living expenses.
Before granting any credit, the lending institution will inform the borrower of all the terms and conditions of the credit, such as the annual percentage rate of charge (APR) and the repayment terms.
The loans that can be subscribed via the Lydia application have a minimum duration of 90 days and a maximum duration of 36 months. The minimum APR is 13.90% and the maximum APR is 20.79%. In all cases, the APR cannot exceed the usury rate determined by the Banque de France.
Below is an example of a credit that can be granted:
Credit amount : € 300.00
Credit term : 90 days
APR : 20.33%
Management fees : € 8.79
Instant reception fees (optional) : € 0.30
Amount of fees paid right away : € 9.09
Amount repaid per month : € 100.00
Total cost of credit : € 309.09

100% secure, the Lydia app is developed in Paris by a passionate and independent team, complying with the latest banking and IT security standards. Lydia respects your privacy and the European GDPR directives.
descriptionShort: Receive, spend and manage all your money more simply, all in a single app.

appDetails.recentChangesHtml: The Guide tab gives pride of place to customer support, bringing together messages exchanged with your team of advisors, access to our user manual, access to our virtual assistance... At the bottom of the Guide tab, they explain, in video, how they use Lydia to manage their money simply, reach their budget targets, etc.

title:
Lydia accounts
12.30.2

creator: Lydia Solutions
descriptionHtml:
The online account you've been waiting for to manage everything online.

*2% interests*
Earn interests on all your money, even on your current account. Paid out every month, net of tax.

*Designed to please you*
Choose the card you need: classic or premium black. Then, go for the leather card holder that suits you best: cowhide, python, or leopard?
And after every card payment, scratch away your lottery ticket to find out if you'll be having your payment paid back or not.

*Old fashioned-2.0*
Learning how to use the Sumeria banking app is very easy and quick, yet it's also packed with next-gen technology that provides you with the highest security standards without compromising on the ease of use on a day-to-day basis.

*Straight to what matters*
Your wire transfers are sent and received instantly, for free. Your receipts and your account are updated after every single transaction, so you know where you stand.

*Simplicity through innovation*
Activate Google Pay to pay with your smartphone or your smart watch, in a single gesture and securely.
And make online purchases with single-use Sumeria cards you can generate in 1 tap. They self-destruct right after the payments for maximum security.

*Your money, hassle-free*
Always make payments with your Sumeria card around the world, whatever the distance. And long gone are the unpleasant surprises since there are no exchange fees.
Organize your budget like a pro by using easy-to-use budgeting envelopes for your groceries or holidays.

*Guaranteed security*
Sumeria is a French and independent institution founded in 2011. It is authorized by the ACPR to provide payment and financial services.
As for all French banks, your money is guaranteed by the FGDR fund up to €100,000.

——

Open one or several online accounts now free of charge, for you, your couple, your family, or your flat-share. Cancel anytime.
You'll receive your card right at your doorstep within a week.
And if you need help, an advisor will be there for you.

——

"Simple and convenient" Vil001395
"The best" Slidouing
"Came in super handy" Moïse37
"Truly hassle-free" Samsam592001
"Awesome" Zod640
descriptionShort: Simple and secure online account

appDetails.recentChangesHtml: Lydia Accounts becomes Sumeria. A new name, with a legacy, and a new design, for a new era. For the creation of a European banking institution, and a simple, safe, and free online account, for you.

descriptionHtml:
The online account you've been waiting for to manage everything online.

*2% interests*
Earn interests on all your money, even on your current account. Paid out every month, net of tax.

*Designed to please you*
Choose the card you need: classic or premium black. Then, go for the leather card holder that suits you best: cowhide, python, or leopard?
And after every card payment, scratch away your lottery ticket to find out if you'll be having your payment paid back or not.

*Old fashioned-2.0*
Learning how to use the Sumeria banking app is very easy and quick, yet it's also packed with next-gen technology that provides you with the highest security standards without compromising on the ease of use on a day-to-day basis.

*Straight to what matters*
Your wire transfers are sent and received instantly, for free. Your receipts and your account are updated after every single transaction, so you know where you stand.

*Simplicity through innovation*
Activate Google Pay to pay with your smartphone or your smart watch, in a single gesture and securely.
And make online purchases with single-use Sumeria cards you can generate in 1 tap. They self-destruct right after the payments for maximum security.

*Your money, hassle-free*
Always make payments with your Sumeria card around the world, whatever the distance. And long gone are the unpleasant surprises since there are no exchange fees.
Organize your budget like a pro by using easy-to-use budgeting envelopes for your groceries or holidays.

*Guaranteed security*
Sumeria is a French and independent institution founded in 2011. It is authorized by the ACPR to provide payment and financial services.
As for all French banks, your money is guaranteed by the FGDR fund up to €100,000.

——

Open one or several online accounts now free of charge, for you, your couple, your family, or your flat-share. Cancel anytime.
You'll receive your card right at your doorstep within a week.
And if you need help, an advisor will be there for you.

——

"Simple and convenient" Vil001395
"The best" Slidouing
"Came in super handy" Moïse37
"Truly hassle-free" Samsam592001
"Awesome" Zod640
descriptionShort: Simple and secure online account

appDetails.recentChangesHtml: The app home screen has been improved: each account now always displays the Sumeria card it's linked to, and the action button for sending money is now always visible in the bottom right-hand corner of the screen. Tapping it prompts a choice between "Lydia payment" and "Wire transfer" with a new animation.
